name: Ballunjui Falls
description:
Introduction

Not really a canyon, this route follows a series of waterfalls in Lamington NP.

Ballunjui Falls are the major falls with a number of optional falls upstream. With a high cascading waterfall dropping over a 100 meters, it's well worth taking a look at this one if you like adventure!

Approach

Head to the Ship's Stern circuit and take the detour to the top of the falls.

To add extra adventure to this trip, you can enter the creek far earlier for an extra 2-3 abseils.

Descent

There are 3 pitches on the main falls. Highest is 60m.

Exit

To exit after the last waterfall, take the lower Bellbird track back up to Binna Burra.

Red tape
